Name: Shikhar Dhawan
Teams: Board Presidents XI, Mumbai Indians, India, Deccan Chargers, India Red, India A, Rest of India, North Zone, Mumbai A, Delhi, Sunrisers Hyderabad, Indians, Delhi Capitals, India B, Asia XI
Bio: Shikhar Dhawan stunned all observers,when he stroked his way to the fastest Test century by a debutant,came to Dhawan in his ninth year of first-class cricket after he had been written off by almost everybody,not least because India's opening combination had been fixed to the most prolific combination in their Test history: Virender Sehwag  Gautam Gambhir,Dhawan is one in a long line of stroke-players from Delhi,which became the Indian batting capital in the 2000s,He sts upright in his stance,is a bit stiff with his hs when he pushes forward,is partial to the cover-drive,Those who played domestic cricket with him say he is supremely confident,bordering on showmanship,He is also a flamboyant personality with his ever-changing looks  the twirled moustache
